price: 23. Ya sôló, baye bazali kofinga mpe kopanzela basi ya malamu baye bakanisaka kosala mabe te (ekobo), okati ya bandimi ya basi, bapesami botutu awa o nsé mpe o mokolo mwa suka, mpe bakozalaka na etumbu ekasi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَرۡمُونَ ٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتِ ٱلۡغَٰفِلَٰتِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ لُعِنُواْ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
